---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: Louis Barclay <louis.barclay@gmail.com>
Date: Fri, Apr 20, 2018 at 4:05 PM
Subject: poem
To: "louis.barclay" <louis.barclay@gmail.com>


from flora and adam's back to fulham
down victoria road
through the mews
hop over the wall
imagine as a leaf fell
if i could use it as a step, then another, and soon be on the rooves

the drunk sounds of saturday london drifting down alleys,
i feel safe
like jungle noises
what a time to be alive
let's go surfing now, everybody's learning how
suddenly it feels like the bus journey can't be long enough

---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: Louis Barclay <louis.barclay@gmail.com>
Date: Fri, Apr 20, 2018 at 4:05 PM
Subject: poem
To: "louis.barclay" <louis.barclay@gmail.com>


from flora and adam's back to fulham
down victoria road
through the mews
hop over the wall
imagine as a leaf fell
if i could use it as a step, then another, and soon be on the rooves

the drunk sounds of saturday london drifting down alleys,
i feel safe
like jungle noises
what a time to be alive
let's go surfing now, everybody's learning how
suddenly it feels like the bus journey can't be long enough
